com.twitter.heron.streamlet

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.streamlet.Config
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Config
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Config is the way users configure the execution of the topology. Things like tuple delivery semantics, resources used, as well as user defined key/value pairs are passed on to the runner via this class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
